### Manual Testing Checklist
- [ ] Tested on **Chrome**
- [ ] Tested on **Firefox** or **Edge**

### Progressive Trust Testing (if applicable)
- [ ] Tested **Phase 1: AI-Only**
- [ ] Tested **Phase 2: Micro-Therapy**
- [ ] Tested **Phase 3: Community (Read-Only)**
- [ ] Tested **Phase 4: Full-Access**
- [ ] Verified **readiness score** calculations
- [ ] Verified **phase gating** (blocked features show lock message)
